fr_cursor.sql: select A.ID_COMPRA, A.ID_COMPRA_ITEM, A.ID_TRIBUTACAO, A.ID_TRIBUTACAO_SERV, A.BASE_ISS, A.ALIQ_ISS, A.ALIQ_RED_BC_ISS, A.VALOR_RED_BC_ISS, A.VALOR_ISS, A.BASE_ISS_RETIDO, A.ALIQ_ISS_RETIDO, A.VALOR_ISS_RETIDO, A.VALOR_DESCONTO_ISS, A.SERVICO_NAO_TRIBUTADO, A.BASE_IPI, A.ALIQ_IPI, A.VALOR_IPI, A.BASE_IPI_OUTROS, A.ALIQ_IPI_OUTROS, A.VALOR_IPI_OUTROS, A.BASE_ICMS_NF, A.ALIQ_ICMS_NF, A.ALIQ_RED_BC_ICMS_NF, A.VALOR_RED_BC_ICMS_NF, A.VALOR_ICMS_NF, A.ALIQ_DESC_SUFRAMA_ICMS, A.BASE_DESC_SUFRAMA_ICMS, A.VALOR_DESC_SUFRAMA_ICMS, A.BASE_ICMS_SUBST, A.ALIQ_ICMS_SUBST, A.ALIQ_RED_BC_SUBST, A.VALOR_RED_BC_SUBST, A.IVA_ICMS_SUBST, A.VALOR_ICMS_SUBST, A.BASE_ICMS_ANTEC, A.ALIQ_ICMS_ANTEC, A.ALIQ_RED_BC_ANTEC, A.VALOR_RED_BC_ANTEC, A.IVA_ICMS_ANTEC, A.VALOR_ICMS_ANTEC, A.COD_ORIGEM, A.ALIQ_DESC_SUFRAMA_PIS, A.VALOR_DESC_SUFRAMA_PIS, A.BASE_PIS, A.ALIQ_PIS, A.VALOR_PIS, A.BASE_PIS_OUTROS, A.ALIQ_PIS_OUTROS, A.VALOR_PIS_OUTROS, A.BASE_PIS_ST, A.ALIQ_PIS_ST, A.VALOR_PIS_ST, A.BASE_COFINS, A.ALIQ_COFINS, A.ALIQ_DESC_SUFRAMA_COFINS, A.VALOR_DESC_SUFRAMA_COFINS, A.VALOR_COFINS, A.BASE_COFINS_OUTROS, A.ALIQ_COFINS_OUTROS, A.VALOR_COFINS_OUTROS, A.BASE_COFINS_ST, A.ALIQ_COFINS_ST, A.VALOR_COFINS_ST, A.BASE_ICMS, A.ALIQ_ICMS, A.VALOR_ICMS, A.VALOR_ICMS_ISENTO, A.VALOR_ICMS_OUTROS, A.BASE_DIF_ALIQUOTA, A.ALIQ_DIF_ALIQUOTA, A.VALOR_DIF_ALIQUOTA, A.USUARIO_CHANGED, A.USUARIO_CREATED, A.DATA_CHANGED, A.DATA_CREATED, A.BASE_ICMS_ANTE_PARC, A.ALIQ_ICMS_ANTE_PARC, A.VALOR_ICMS_ANTE_PARC, A.ID_CFOP_ISS, A.MOD_BC_ICMS, A.MOD_BC_ICMS_ST, A.MOD_BC_ICMS_ANTEC, A.ID_CST_COFINS, A.ID_CST_ICMS, A.ID_CST_PIS, A.ID_CST_IPI, A.DESC_REDUZ_BC_ICMS, A.DESC_REDUZ_BC_ICMS_ST, A.DESC_REDUZ_BC_ICMS_ANTEC, A.SOMAR_IPI_BC_ICMS, A.RED_BC_ST_DESP_ACESS, A.DESCONTO_NO_IPI, A.ALIQ_RED_BC_IPI, A.VALOR_RED_BC_IPI, A.COD_CST_ICMS, A.COD_CST_IPI, A.CALC_ICMS_ANTEC_PARCIAL, A.DESC_SUFRAMA_DESP_ACESS, A.PRECO_UNIT_LIQ_SUFRAMA, A.COD_CST_COFINS, A.COD_CST_PIS, A.DSCNT_SUFRAMA_PISCOFINS_ST, A.IPI_PISCOFINS_ST, A.AJUSTE_PRECO_ICMS_ST, A.ID_CFOP_ICMS, A.BASE_ICMSST_RET, A.VALR_ICMSST_RET, A.VLR_RAT_FRETE_NF, A.VLR_RAT_FRETE_ICMS, A.VLR_RAT_FRETE_ICMS_TRIB, B.ID_TRIBUTACAO as TRIB_ID_TRIBUTACAO, B.ID_MSG_FISCAL as TRIB_ID_MSG_FISCAL, B.ID_CST_COFINS as TRIB_ID_CST_COFINS, B.ID_CST_PIS as TRIB_ID_CST_PIS, B.ID_CST_IPI as TRIB_ID_CST_IPI, B.MOD_BC_ICMS_ANTEC as TRIB_MOD_BC_ICMS_ANTEC, B.MOD_BC_ICMS_ST as TRIB_MOD_BC_ICMS_ST, B.MOD_BC_ICMS as TRIB_MOD_BC_ICMS, B.ID_CST_ICMS as TRIB_ID_CST_ICMS, B.ID_CSON as TRIB_ID_CSON, B.TIPO_MOV as TRIB_TIPO_MOV, B.ALIQ_ICMS as TRIB_ALIQ_ICMS, B.ALIQ_ICMS_CSON as TRIB_ALIQ_ICMS_CSON, B.RED_BC_ICMS as TRIB_RED_BC_ICMS, B.TIPO_RED_ICMS as TRIB_TIPO_RED_ICMS, B.SOMAR_IPI_BC_ICMS as TRIB_SOMAR_IPI_BC_ICMS, B.TIPO_BASE_ICMS as TRIB_TIPO_BASE_ICMS, B.ALIQ_ICMS_ST as TRIB_ALIQ_ICMS_ST, B.RED_BC_ICMS_ST as TRIB_RED_BC_ICMS_ST, B.MVA_ICMS_ST as TRIB_MVA_ICMS_ST, B.ALIQ_ICMS_ANTEC as TRIB_ALIQ_ICMS_ANTEC, B.RED_BC_ICMS_ANTEC as TRIB_RED_BC_ICMS_ANTEC, B.MVA_ICMS_ANTEC as TRIB_MVA_ICMS_ANTEC, B.ALIQ_IPI as TRIB_ALIQ_IPI, B.RED_BC_IPI as TRIB_RED_BC_IPI, B.ALIQ_COFINS as TRIB_ALIQ_COFINS, B.ALIQ_PIS as TRIB_ALIQ_PIS, B.CALC_DIF_ALIQUOTA as TRIB_CALC_DIF_ALIQUOTA, B.ALIQ_ICMS_INTERNA as TRIB_ALIQ_ICMS_INTERNA, B.CREDITAR_ICMS as TRIB_CREDITAR_ICMS, B.ALIQ_CRED_ICMS as TRIB_ALIQ_CRED_ICMS, B.CALC_ICMS_ANTEC_PARCIAL as TRIB_CALC_ICMS_ANTEC_PARCIAL, B.DESC_SUFRAMA_DESP_ACESS as TRIB_DESC_SUFRAMA_DESP_ACESS, B.RED_BC_ST_DESP_ACESS as TRIB_RED_BC_ST_DESP_ACESS, B.DESC_REDUZ_BC_ICMS_ANTEC as TRIB_DESC_REDUZ_BC_ICMS_ANTEC, B.ALIQ_ICMS_UF_DEST as TRIB_ALIQ_ICMS_UF_DEST, B.ALIQ_RED_BC_UF_DEST as TRIB_ALIQ_RED_BC_UF_DEST, B.ALIQ_FCP_UF_DEST as TRIB_ALIQ_FCP_UF_DEST, B.ALIQ_IPI_OUTROS as TRIB_ALIQ_IPI_OUTROS, B.CALC_MVA_AJUSTADO as TRIB_CALC_MVA_AJUSTADO, B.TIPO_BASE_ICMS_ST as TRIB_TIPO_BASE_ICMS_ST, B.TIPO_BASE_ICMS_SN as TRIB_TIPO_BASE_ICMS_SN, B.SOMAR_IPI_BC_ICMS_SN as TRIB_SOMAR_IPI_BC_ICMS_SN, D.TIPO_MOV as MOD_ICMS_ST_TIPO_MOV, D.EN_TIPO_IMPOSTO as MOD_ICMS_ST_EN_TIPO_IMPOSTO, D.VALOR_PARAM as MOD_ICMS_ST_VALOR_PARAM, E.TIPO_MOV as MOD_ICMS_ANTEC_TIPO_MOV, E.EN_TIPO_IMPOSTO as MOD_ICMS_ANTEC_EN_TIPO_IMPOSTO, E.VALOR_PARAM as MOD_ICMS_ANTEC_VALOR_PARAM, C.TIPO_MOV as MOD_ICMS_TIPO_MOV, C.EN_TIPO_IMPOSTO as MOD_ICMS_EN_TIPO_IMPOSTO, C.VALOR_PARAM as MOD_ICMS_VALOR_PARAM, F.COD_CST as CST_ICMS_COD_CST, F.CALC_ICMS as CST_ICMS_CALC_ICMS, F.CALC_ICMS_ST as CST_ICMS_CALC_ICMS_ST, F.RED_BC_ICMS as CST_ICMS_RED_BC_ICMS, F.CALC_ICMS_ANTEC as CST_ICMS_CALC_ICMS_ANTEC, G.COD_CST as CST_IPI_COD_CST, G.TIPO_MOV as CST_IPI_TIPO_MOV, G.CALC_IPI as CST_IPI_CALC_IPI, H.COD_CST as CST_PIS_COD_CST, H.TIPO_MOV as CST_PIS_TIPO_MOV, H.EN_TIPO_PIS as CST_PIS_EN_TIPO_PIS, I.COD_CST as CST_COFINS_COD_CST, I.TIPO_MOV as CST_COFINS_TIPO_MOV, I.EN_TIPO_COFINS as CST_COFINS_EN_TIPO_COFINS, J.ID_TRIBUTACAO_SERV as TRIB_SERV_ID_TRIBUTACAO_SERV, J.ID_CST_COFINS as TRIB_SERV_ID_CST_COFINS, J.ID_CST_PIS as TRIB_SERV_ID_CST_PIS, J.MOD_BC_ISS as TRIB_SERV_MOD_BC_ISS, J.ALIQ_ISS as TRIB_SERV_ALIQ_ISS, J.ALIQ_RED_BC_ISS as TRIB_SERV_ALIQ_RED_BC_ISS, J.ALIQ_PIS as TRIB_SERV_ALIQ_PIS, J.ALIQ_COFINS as TRIB_SERV_ALIQ_COFINS, K.CALC_PCC_PROD as TB_RET_CALC_PCC_PROD, K.CALC_IRRF_PS as TB_RET_CALC_IRRF_PS, K.ALIQ_PIS as TB_RET_ALIQ_PIS, K.ALIQ_COFINS as TB_RET_ALIQ_COFINS, K.ALIQ_CLSS as TB_RET_ALIQ_CLSS, K.ALIQ_IRPJ_COMB as TB_RET_ALIQ_IRPJ_COMB, K.ALIQ_IRPJ_SERV as TB_RET_ALIQ_IRPJ_SERV, K.ALIQ_IRPJ as TB_RET_ALIQ_IRPJ, L.ALIQ_IRRF as TB_RET_IRRF_ALIQ_IRRF, L.CALC_RETENCAO as TB_RET_IRRF_CALC_RETENCAO, M.ALIQ_INSS as TB_RET_INSS_ALIQ_INSS, M.CALC_RETENCAO as TB_RET_INSS_CALC_RETENCAO, N.COD_CSON as CSON_COD_CSON, N.CALC_ICMS as CSON_CALC_ICMS, A.ID_RETENCAO_INSS, A.ID_RETENCAO_IRRF, A.ID_RETENCAO, A.BASE_PIS_RETIDO, A.ALIQ_PIS_RETIDO, A.VALOR_PIS_RETIDO, A.BASE_COFINS_RETIDO, A.ALIQ_COFINS_RETIDO, A.VALOR_COFINS_RETIDO, A.BASE_IRRF, A.ALIQ_IRRF, A.VALOR_IRRF, A.BASE_CSLL, A.ALIQ_CSLL, A.VALOR_CSLL, A.BASE_INSS_RETIDO, A.ALIQ_INSS_RETIDO, A.VALOR_INSS_RETIDO, A.BC_ICMS_UF_DEST, A.ALIQ_ICMS_UF_DEST, A.ALIQ_FCP_UF_DEST, A.VALOR_FCP_UF_DEST, A.ALIQ_ICMS_INTER, A.PERC_ICMS_UF_DEST, A.VALOR_ICMS_PARTILHA_UF_DEST, A.VALOR_ICMS_PARTILHA_UF_REMET, A.VLR_TOT_TRIB, A.INF_AD_FISCO, B.DESCRICAO as TRIB_DESCR_TRIBUTACAO, O.DESCRICAO as CFOP_ICMS_DESCR, C.DESCRICAO as MOD_BC_ICMS_DESCR, D.DESCRICAO as MOD_BC_ICMS_ST_DESCR, E.DESCRICAO as MOD_BC_ICMS_ANTEC_DESCR, G.DESCRICAO as CST_IPI_DESCR, H.DESCRICAO as CST_PIS_DESCR, I.DESCRICAO as CST_COFINS_DESCR, J.DESCRICAO as TRIB_SERV_DESC_TRIBUT, Q.DESCRICAO as CFOP_ISS_DESC, '' as TRIB_OCORRENCIA_IMPOSTO, '' as TMP_COD_ITEM, '' as TMP_DESCR_ITEM from CP_COMPRA_ITEM_IMPOSTO A left join TB_TRIBUTACAO B on B.ID_TRIBUTACAO = A.ID_TRIBUTACAO left join TB_MOD_ICMS C on C.ID_MOD_ICMS = A.MOD_BC_ICMS left join TB_MOD_ICMS D on D.ID_MOD_ICMS = A.MOD_BC_ICMS_ST left join TB_MOD_ICMS E on E.ID_MOD_ICMS = A.MOD_BC_ICMS_ANTEC left join TB_CST_ICMS F on F.ID_CST_ICMS = A.ID_CST_ICMS left join TB_CST_IPI G on G.ID_CST_IPI = A.ID_CST_IPI left join TB_CST_PIS H on H.ID_CST_PIS = A.ID_CST_PIS left join TB_CST_COFINS I on I.ID_CST_COFINS = A.ID_CST_COFINS left join TB_TRIBUTACAO_SERV J on J.ID_TRIBUTACAO_SERV = A.ID_TRIBUTACAO_SERV left join TB_RETENCAO K on K.ID_RETENCAO = A.ID_RETENCAO left join TB_RETENCAO_IRRF L on L.ID_RETENCAO_IRRF = A.ID_RETENCAO_IRRF left join TB_RETENCAO_INSS M on M.ID_RETENCAO_INSS = A.ID_RETENCAO_INSS left join TB_CSON N on N.ID_CSON = B.ID_CSON left join CFOP O on A.ID_CFOP_ICMS = O.ID_CFOP left join CFOP Q on A.ID_CFOP_ISS = Q.ID_CFOP
